content: brown 8 ch1 decrease around slip_stitch 6 9 -21 ch1 single_crochet in each st slip_stitch 6 fasten_off insert a pipe cleaner in the trunk push and bend it in the root area sew tree crown and tree trunk together for a shorter/longer tree make less or more rounds in trunk part candy cane work in continuous spiral start with magic_ring 1 in white 6sc into the magic_ring 6 2 -21 single_crochet in each st around 6 make more/less rounds for bigger/smaller candy cane fasten_off insert a pipe cleaner using a needle weave the tail through the front loops of the last 6 st s pull tightly and close the opening weave in loose end take red yarn wrap a cane in spiral around weave in loose ends i hope you enjoyed making my christmas mice please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions www facebook com/doubletrebletrinkets thank you  christmas mice santa s sleigh pattern by uljana semikrasa treble_crochet trinkets 2014 type text page 9
